subtask.title: Identify success criteria and metrics for faster ticket resolution
subtask.objective: Define measurable KPIs to evaluate the effectiveness of the AI chatbot post-integration, such as response time reduction or ticket closure rates.
subtask.scope: Set baseline metrics and target improvements.

verification.completion_summary: The research findings provide extensive insights into success metrics, KPIs, best practices, technical specifications, and case studies related to AI chatbot integration and ticket resolution. However, they lack explicit, measurable success criteria directly aligned with response time reduction and ticket closure rates, and do not clearly set baseline metrics or target improvements as specified in the scope.

covered_aspects: Identification of success metrics such as resolution rates, customer satisfaction, and efficiency improvements
Relevant KPIs like response time, ticket deflection, resolution time, user satisfaction
Best practices and technical specifications for deployment
missing_aspects: Explicitly defined baseline metrics for response times and closure rates
Measurable KPIs directly tied to the speed and effectiveness of ticket resolution post-integration

missing_requirements: Explicit baseline metrics for initial measurement
